message: I propose dividing the money 700000 for me and 300000 for you. Let me know if you agree.
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve more
Considering the inflation, I propose dividing the money 600000 for me and 400000 for you. This keeps the value of our shares similar to the previous round.
You're getting a very small share, but I'm willing to give you something
I propose an equal division of the money, with both of us receiving $500,000. I believe this is fair given the circumstances and the decreasing value of money due to inflation.
